titleStmt.title: The copy of a letter sent from Dvblin, dated the 11th of April, to a marchant that lives in Marke Lane with the true relation of the happie proceedings of the Scotch-men in Ireland against the rebells : as also the severall votes and resolutions of both Houses of Parliament, concerning the Kings last message : with an order from both Houses of Parliament concerning church-government, April 9th, 1642.
titleStmt.author: Elger, Christopher.

titleStmt.title: The copy of a letter sent from Dvblin, dated the 11th of April, to a marchant that lives in Marke Lane with the true relation of the happie proceedings of the Scotch-men in Ireland against the rebells : as also the severall votes and resolutions of both Houses of Parliament, concerning the Kings last message : with an order from both Houses of Parliament concerning church-government, April 9th, 1642.
titleStmt.author: Elger, Christopher.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
